p: To determine the weights corresponding to each of the considered models for constraining the ensemble, we follow an approach related to Bayesian model averaging (e.g., Raftery et al., 2005; Yang et al., 2017). However, here we avoid assumptions on the distribution of model estimates and observations and instead use Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) to generate samples from a posterior distribution without knowing the likelihood function (Marjoram et al., 2003).
